Title: Turn and Face the Strange
Plot: As Danko spearheads the government operation, someone close to him is put in the line of fire. HRG?s life continues to spiral out of control and his marriage is dangerously close to the breaking point. Meanwhile, Hiro and Ando continue their road trip with a special delivery for Matt Parkman. Elsewhere, Angela Petrelli unearths the demons of her past.
GuestStars: Zeljko Ivanek, Katherine Boecher, Kenneth Choi, Ned Vaughn
